meanings.sent1: The meeting is transpiring at noon.
meanings.sent2: The event transpiring tomorrow is exciting.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party transpiring next week will be fun.
meanings.sent4: Change is transpiring in the company.
meanings.sent5: The magic show transpiring tonight will be amazing.

meanings.definition: To be revealed or become known
meanings.sent2: The mystery transpiring in the story is intriguing.
meanings.sent3: The secret transpiring unexpectedly surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her talent is transpiring through her artwork.
meanings.sent5: The plot twist transpiring at the end shocked the audience.

meanings.definition: To give off moisture through the surface, as a plant
meanings.sent1: The leaves are transpiring in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The flower transpiring in the morning dew looks fresh.
meanings.sent3: The plant transpiring after watering shows it's healthy.
meanings.sent4: The tree transpiring in the rain is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The garden transpiring in the heat needs watering.
